title: Nice hotel very close to the wharf and other activities
text: We tried out a tall room which Kimpton offers in many of their properties. The accommodations were good for tall people except the robes weren't nearly long enough for my 6'10" boyfriend. The room was pretty large and had some extra amenities such as a DVD player and an iHome alarm clock in addition to the usual hotel things. The 5 pm wine hour was a nice touch. We enjoyed the restaurant too, especially the clam and corn chowder.
